name: Flood Escape 2D
description:
-Warning-

This game is highly inspired by the Roblox game Flood Escape and Flood Escape 2.

-Game Info-

Flood Escape 2D is a remake of Fe2 where you have to get to the highest point of the level before the lava rises to high. Each level in the game gets harder and harder and some levels you might be stuck on for a while. This is one of my first games so it might be bad, Enjoy!
